005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.UriReferenceAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
017
018import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
020
021import java.net.URI;
022
023@SuppressWarnings({
024    "PMD.DataClass",
025    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
026})
027@MetaschemaAssembly(
028    formalName = "Example",
029    name = "example",
030    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
031public class Example implements IBoundObject {
032  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
033
034  @BoundFlag(
035      formalName = "Example Reference",
036      name = "ref",
037      typeAdapter = UriReferenceAdapter.class)
038  private URI _ref;
039
040  @BoundFlag(
041      name = "path",
042      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
043  private String _path;
044
045  @BoundField(
046      formalName = "Example Description",
047      useName = "description",
048      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
049  private MarkupLine _description;
050
051  @BoundField(
052      formalName = "Remarks",
053      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
054      useName = "remarks")
055  private Remarks _remarks;
056
057  public Example() {
058    this(null);
059  }
060
061  public Example(IMetaschemaData data) {
062    this.__metaschemaData = data;
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
067    return __metaschemaData;
068  }
069
070  public URI getRef() {
071    return _ref;
072  }
073
074  public void setRef(URI value) {
075    _ref = value;
076  }
077
078  public String getPath() {
079    return _path;
080  }
081
082  public void setPath(String value) {
083    _path = value;
084  }
085
086  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
087    return _description;
088  }
089
090  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
091    _description = value;
092  }
093
094  public Remarks getRemarks() {
095    return _remarks;
096  }
097
098  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
099    _remarks = value;
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  public String toString() {
104    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
105  }
106}
